body: I can't stand to look at all of Mado's cannibalism work but each time I try harder to look away I just look even more and now these pictures can't get out of my head
Why ? Just why does this exist ?

It's either she is Mai-chan's kid who gained her immortality or just someone. Also if you guys don't know Mai is from Mai-chan's Daily Life, good gore doujin that one though it was the one the scarred me.
